description: A collection of circles in a downward-pointing triangular formation with two thin rectangular formations extending from each side just above the bottom point. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a dark orange triangle above the center of the formation and a larger dark orange triangle on the left side of the formation toward the bottom.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

content: April 08, 2022. In search of dead meat. #NYTVertex
